10000 FOR I=0 TO 26: READ X: POKE 828+I,X: NEXT I
10001 DATA 169,000,160,208,133,095,132,096
10002 DATA 169,000,160,224,133,090,132,091
10003 DATA 169,000,160,064,133,088,132,089
10004 DATA 076,191,163
10005 POKE 56334,PEEK(56334) AND 254
10006 POKE 1,PEEK(1) AND 251
10007 SYS 828
10008 POKE 1,PEEK(1) OR 4
10009 POKE 56334,PEEK(56334) OR 1
10010 POKE 53272,PEEK(53272) AND 240 OR 12
10011 FOR A=12800 TO 12959: READ ZE: POKE A,ZE: NEXT A
10012 REM NEUKAUF
10013 DATA 126,110,102,102,98,0,0,0
10014 DATA 6,6,6,6,6,0,0,0
10015 DATA 126,110,102,102,98,0,0,0
10016 DATA 6,6,6,6,6,0,0,0
10017 REM VERSAND
10018 DATA 254,4,4,8,240,0,0,0
10019 DATA 127,32,32,16,15,0,0,0
10020 DATA 254,4,4,8,240,0,0,0
10021 DATA 127,32,32,16,15,0,0,0
10022 REM ANKAUF
10023 DATA 128,224,192,128,0,0,0,0
10024 DATA 1,7,3,1,0,0,0,0
10025 DATA 128,224,192,128,0,0,0,0
10026 DATA 1,7,3,1,0,0,0,0
10027 REM VERKAUF
10028 DATA 0,8,12,126,126,12,8,0
10029 DATA 0,0,0,0,0,0,0,0
10030 DATA 0,8,12,126,126,12,8,0
10031 DATA 0,0,0,0,0,0,0,0
10032 REM PERSONAL
10033 DATA 0,16,48,126,126,48,16,0
10034 DATA 0,0,0,0,0,0,0,0
10035 DATA 0,16,48,126,126,48,16,0
10036 DATA 0,0,0,0,0,0,0,0
10037 RETURN
